amendment.description: Amendment sought to rescind an additional $5 million from the Department of Energy fossil energy research and development activities account
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase the amount of funds to be rescinded for Energy Department fossil energy research and development activities, to be used for a coal gasification project in southern Illinois from $19 million to $24 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rohrabacher amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 142 - 274 (Roll no. 246).
